properties.Name: The Emporium
properties.Description: Emporium@55 is an exciting day opportunity for adults with learning disabilities to develop skills in retail, social enterprise and running a business.We are connecting with local artists & crafts people to showcase their creations whilst building social
properties.Address: 53-55 Southbourne Grove, Southbourne, Bournemouth BH6 3QU
properties.Description2: connections and work together with the wider community.

properties.Name: Artsable
properties.Description: Arts and Crafts, Every Wednesday morning, 10am - midday
properties.Address: Winton Methodist Church, Bournemouth, Dorset

properties.Name: The Bridge
properties.Description: We are connecting with local artists & crafts people to showcase their creations whilst building social connections and work together with the wider community.
properties.Address: The Bridge, Chaseside, Bournemouth

properties.Name: Holtwood Community Farm
properties.Description:
Welcome to Holtwood Community Farm

We are a day service provider for adults with mental health problems, Autism and other learning difficulties based on 15 acres of land in the beautiful countryside near Wimborne, Dorset. 

Our aim is to provide a
properties.Address: Pondhead Lane, Holtwood, Holt, Dorset BH21 7DX
properties.Description2: safe and relaxing environment in which our clients can explore and learn about the countryside, agriculture and horticulture whilst also developing their independence, interpersonal skills and confidence.

properties.Name: Christchurch Connect
properties.Description: The service offers a lively and diverse environment. There are a wide range of activities to support people to achieve their goals and outcomes, including art and crafts; jewellery making; painting; flower arranging; cookery sessions in the specially
properties.Address: Loring Road, Christchurch, BH23 2GZ
properties.Description2: equipped kitchen; music and singing. Pottery and craft groups, computer suite and dance group

properties.Name: Tricuro Reablement
properties.Description: Tricuro is wholly owned by Dorset Council and Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole Council and provides short and long term high quality care and support to adults, their carers and families. We have highly trained and skilled staff and offer flexibility
properties.Address: Coastal Lodge, 26 Knyveton Road, Bournemouth, BH1 3QR
properties.Description2: , consistency and reliability of service across the county which is focused on meeting the needs of people in our communities.

properties.Name: Say So Create
properties.Description: Say So deliver fun and engaging creative workshops for children and adults with learning disabilities. We run person centred workshops, tailored specifically to meet the needs of the individuals within the group. We are an all inclusive company and provide
properties.Address: Civic Centre, Poole, Dorset BH15 2RY
properties.Description2: a supportive environment to increase confidence, motivation and self-esteem. Facilitators are trained & experienced at working with people with learning difficulties and work in an intuitive manner

properties.Name: Valley View Community Care Farm
properties.Description: A community care farm, open to all, in Lytchett Matravers. Look out for Young Dorset's news on its new farm, 'Valley View Farm'.  This is an exciting, much needed community land based environment in Lytchett Matravers that will help our community groups
properties.Address: Valley View Community Care Farm, Castle Farm Road, Lytchett Matravers, Poole, Dorset BH16 6HQ
properties.Description2: from SEN, over 55's dementia to retired famers with little or no social networks (to name a few).

properties.Name: Coda Music
properties.Description: Coda uses music as a tool for personal and social change. We love music and believe in its power to transform lives. Coda provides a place to learn, train and develop, and we offer help and support through participation and therapy.
properties.Address: Chewton Farm Road, Christchurch, Dorset BH23 5QL

properties.Name: Awesome Nights Youth Club
properties.Description: We hold a weekly youth club for young people with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND) from the ages for 13 to 19-years old.
properties.Address: Coping with Chaos, Bond Avenue, West Moors, Ferndown, Dorset BH22 0LL

properties.Name: The Lantern
properties.Description: Our aim is to support and encourage every person in reaching their individual potential, through meaningful day activities. By celebrating and recognising individual and shared achievements, an atmosphere of trust and mutual support is developed. Our
properties.Address: Folly Farm Lane, Street Ives, Ringwood, Hampshire BH24 2NN
properties.Description2: facilities for Day Activities are wide and varied and include: Shop, Café,  Bakery, Pottery, Weavers, Land Craft, Art Studio, Seasonal Crafts.

properties.Name: High Mead Farm
properties.Description: We are a therapeutic farm in Longham, Ferndown. With the experienced guidance and support from our Staff and the generosity of our Volunteers we offer a day service to members of the public living with mental health issues, physical disabilities,
properties.Address: High Mead Farm, Ham Lane, Wimborne, Dorset
properties.Description2: addiction, Alzheimer & dementia diagnosis, brain injury, vision & hearing impairment, autism, children excluded from school, Parkinson’s and learning difficulties to engage in an array of interesting activities on the farm.

properties.Name: RDA East Holton Driving Centre Group
properties.Description: Horse Riding for Adults and Children with learning disbilities
properties.Address: BH16 6JN

properties.Name: RDA Green Cottage Riding School
properties.Description: Horse Riding for Adults and Children with learning disbilities
properties.Address: 136 Church Rd, Three Legged Cross, Wimborne BH21 6RF

properties.Name: Victoria Horticulture
properties.Description: This dedicated Horticultural service – aimed at adults with disabilities – will provide unique learning experiences within our beautiful landscaped grounds. Trained staff work with each person in all aspects of Horticulture.  Equipment is adapted as
properties.Address: 12 Lindsay Road, Poole, Dorset BH13 6AS
properties.Description2: is the accommodation to enable full access to the programme. A typical day may include planting next year’s seedlings, pruning within the gardens, creating hanging baskets for the community or harvesting the vegetables.

properties.Name: The Stables (Aspire)
properties.Description:
Set in beautiful walled gardens on the Hampshire/Dorset border. 
Aspire offers a wide variety of meaningful day activities for adults with learning disabilities.We are dedicated to supporting people to lead healthier lifestyles by offering a wide range of daily physical activities to suit all levels of fitness.
On a weekly basis we offer a wide range
properties.Address: The Stables, Bisterne, Ringwood
properties.Description2: of fitness and social activities on and off site, inc walking, swimming, yoga, gym sessions, go–karting, Zumba, lawn sports, meditation and relaxation.

properties.Name: Gifted Day Service and Garden Centre
properties.Description: Gifted is a small Garden Centre Gift Shop in Highcliffe Supporting Adults with Learning Disabilities
properties.Address: Gifted, 316 Lymington Rd, Highcliffe, Highcliffe, United Kingdom

properties.Name: Spiral Blue, Windward Day Services
properties.Description: We support people to access many activities both inside and throughout our community. We are aware of the need to be physically healthy so provide sporting opportunities through the week including swimming, football, cricket, bowling etc. We also have a
properties.Address: Duck island Lane, Ringwood
properties.Description2:
focus on independent living skills so encourage people to people to develop their cooking and money skills.
Social relationships are key with the service we provide and by using group activities such as drama, art, film making and music.

properties.Name: Livability Stepping Stones
properties.Description:
Livability Stepping Stones provides day opportunities for adults with intellectual disabilities.
Livability Stepping Stones is an Independent Living service run by Livability, the disability charity that connects people with
properties.Address: 40 The Avenue, Moordown, Bournemouth, Dorset BH9 2UW
properties.Description2:
their communities.
Livability Independent Living specialises in providing flexible, client-driven approach to care, health and inclusion requirements for people with a wide range of needs and living situations.

properties.Name: Parkstone Connect
properties.Description:
Parkstone Connect in Poole is a busy centre providing leisure and learning opportunities for adults with disabilities.
The service boasts a sports activity hall; music room; computer room; art studio complete with kiln;
properties.Address: Parkstone Connect, Croft Road, Parkstone, Poole, Dorset BH12 3LD
properties.Description2:
a sensory room and other rooms for group activities and individuals to socialise.
The service has a vibrant timetable with a wide range of activities that work towards achieving clients’ individual goals and outcomes.

properties.Name: The Creative Skills Hub
properties.Description: Our vision here at The Creative Skills Hub is to value and empower individuals with different abilities (learning disabilities) and to advocate the importance of equality in our society.
properties.Address: Village Hall, 3 Common Road, Sixpenny Handley, Dorset SP5 5NJ

properties.Name: Three Sixty Inclusive
properties.Description: ThreeSixty inclusive is a 'Community Micro Enterprise' that works across Dorset, Christchurch, Bournemouth & Poole. We provide outcome focussed short, medium and long term support to people with learning disabilities and/or mental health issues within
properties.Address: North Road, Poole
properties.Description2: their own homes, or out and about in the community, using small teams of 'support partners'.

properties.Name: Well 4 Life
properties.Description:
Well 4 Life is a day provision for adults with learning disabilities/difficulties which focuses on, Physical Health, Healthy Eating, Confidence Building, and Accessing the Community.
" The aim of this provision is to develop the all round wellbeing of
properties.Address: St Johns Centre, Ashley Road, Poole, Dorset.
properties.Description2: each individual in a safe, secure and friendly environment "

properties.Name: Herons View Care Farm
properties.Description:
The service is developed for each individual by supporting their interests and promoting their strengths. So allowing each person to develop practical and interpersonal skills in a friendly environment.
There is the opportunity to take a City & Guilds,
properties.Address: Jenkins Farm, Wareham, Dorset BH20 7NW
properties.Description2:
Skills for Working Life qualification.  Sessions offered 
Monday to Friday

properties.Name: Assist West Dorset
properties.Description: ASSIST West Dorset is for people who want support to live as fully, and independently as they wish - 0800 to 2200, seven days a week.
properties.Address: Cattistock, Dorchester, Dorset DT2 0JL

properties.Name: Speak Up
properties.Description: Speaking Up is where people with learning disabilities come together to develop their speaking up skills. It can be very difficult for someone with a learning disability and limited communicated skills to know how to speak up for themselves.
properties.Address: 2 Herringston Barn, Herringston, Dorchester, Dorset DT2 9PU

properties.Name: Dorset Abilities Cinema Club
properties.Description: Our aim is to help enable adults with learning disabilities, autism and mental health needs from Dorset to have access to the enjoyment of going to the movies and meeting new friends
properties.Address: 110 Chickerell Road, Weymouth, Dorset DT4 0BT

properties.Name: Chesil Sailability
properties.Description: We suport people with any kind of disabilty to come sailing - you don't have to know how to sail already! Our current sailors range from people with visual impairements, long term health conditions to high spinal cord injuries and profound physical and
properties.Address: Weymouth & Portland National Sailing Academy, Osprey Quay, Isle of Portland, Dorset DT5 1SA
properties.Description2: learning disabilities. Our sailors come sailing to experience the joy and freedom of being afloat, and some choose to learn how to sail or to race, but it is all about what you want to get out of it!

properties.Name: A-Stars
properties.Description: A-Stars is a club for children aged 5 or over, and young adults with Asperger's Syndrome or an autism related condition (ASC),and their families.
properties.Address: sperger's Base at Budmouth Technology College, Chickerell Road, Weymouth, Dorset DT4 9SY

properties.Name: stAbility
properties.Description: A Day Care Provision aimed at encouraging independent living skills and personal development for young people and adults with mild to moderate learning difficulties.  stABILITY is here to offer skills training for those aged 18 and over. An intimate
properties.Address: 126 Newstead Road, Weymouth, DT4 0AR, United Kingdom
properties.Description2: programme for a small group, focusing on independent living skills, enterprise, staying safe, healthy living, socializing and having fun.

properties.Name: able2achieve
properties.Description: able2achieve supports individuals with learning disabilities, mental health, and other associated disabilities. we support individuals in a variety of different ways from everyday living skills to attending social events such as concerts
properties.Address: 23/25 Princes Street, Yeovil, Somerset BA20 1EN

properties.Name: The Green Shed
properties.Description: The Green Shed is an award-winning workshop, assisting adults with learning disabilities. We offer opportunities for those with memory problems, incl dementia. We provide a range of work based activities and are situated at Castle Gardens, Sherborne.
properties.Address: The Green Shed, Castle Gardens, New Road, Sherborne, Dorset DT9 5NR

properties.Name: Magdalen Farm
properties.Description: Magdalen is an 132-acre organic working farm on the banks of the River Axe.  We offer flexible accomodation for small and large groups in our residential centre and traditional farmhouse. Good food is a big deal here - our visitors can enjoy delicious
properties.Address: Magdalen Farm, Winsham, Maudlin, Chard, Somerset TA20 4PA
properties.Description2: home-cooked food from our own kitchen and gardens. Visiting Magdalen Farm for your school trip is an opportunity to learn through real outdoor adventures - while enjoying home cooked organic food and a very high standard of on-site accommodation.

properties.Name: Hipp!!Bones
properties.Description: Hipp!!Bones provides a targeted youth club for young people with learning difficulties, disabilities, Autism and/or additional needs living in North Dorset and neighbouring counties. We predominantly cater for young people aged 11-19 years of age, . We offer four longer sessions across the year, in the school holidays, for off-site activities. The club encourages young people to explore new activities and gain life skills, through a variety of arts & crafts, cookery, and sporting pursuits. Air hockey, pool, and the Nintendo Wii are also available in the Coffee Bar. All activities are appropriately differentiated to meet each young person’s needs, routines are in place giving a sense of security, and staff use simple language reinforced with visual clues and sign language to support communication. We have communication aids; switches and switch activated resources to enable young people with Profound and Multiple Learning Difficulties  to participate independently in activities and have greater control over their immediate environment.
properties.Address: Youth Centre, Cemetery Road, Gillingham, Dorset SP8 4AZ
properties.Description2: although we can continue to cater for our members up to the age of 25 years of age. Hipp!!Bones runs from Gillingham Youth & Community Centre, Cemetery Road, Gillingham from 10 am to 12 noon on the 1st and 3rd Saturday of the month, all year round
